Class CustomPageImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.data.domain.PageImpl<T>
com.vagsoft.bookstore.pagination.CustomPageImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the elements in the page
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<T>, Supplier<Stream<T>>, org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T>, org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<T>, org.springframework.data.util.Streamable<T>
public class CustomPageImpl<T> extends org.springframework.data.domain.PageImpl<T>
Custom implementation of the PageImpl class
